channel.title: fun on A Nerd's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in fun on A Nerd's Tale

item.title: Not that much of an eventful week
item.description: To be fair, my speaking skills probably haven’t improved that much, but I no longer feel nervous while on the stage, like I used to feel earlier, thanks to the session that I took on the recent ILUGD meetup.

item.title: It is New Year my dudes
item.description: If you don’t get the meme reference from the title, here is one more for you : Enough of memes, lets talk about something trendy, something that everyone is talking about cause January 2019 is all about setting up goals and resolutions, I am not being punny here.

item.title: Flashback 2018
item.description: tl;dr, Typical end of the year post as you may expect. Well, 2018 was a significantly productive year for me compared to other years, learned so many things which I wanted to, plus added more things to the bucket list for the coming year.
